Title: Take Down the Wing Leader
Description:
The mantid have lain siege to Niuzao Temple.

Even now, Wing Leader Ner'onok and his forces work to cross the final chasm.

You must stop him before they reconstruct that bridge.
PortraitGiverText: Take him down over the bridge.
RewardText:
The wing leader lies dead and the siege is broken.

You've saved the temple, $n.
